column1: 2006-08-10‎Of all the lives in this world
column2: apparently mine is the only one that’s meaningful. And that’s the truth . . . when you look at people today
column4: all dressed up and dolled up to the max but that is only the shell. Inside
column5: it is empty. We only live to produce ourselves. We downright market ourselves. Every person wants to sell the product “I” as something wonderful
column6: and because one person is dumber than the other
column7: it works great. Whoever doesn’t want to go along with it
column8: stands alone. I say: “Fuck you!” Why do people have such a hard time taking things the way they are
column9: I mean why don’t my parents
column11: or whoever else accept my Mohawk? Why do people not accept my ap- pearance? They think to themselves: “Why can’t he run around normally?” But can you tell me what “normal” is? Is there a book or a homepage somewhere that commands you to act normal
column12: including an explanation on what “normal” is? HARDLY LIKELY! SO
column13: STOP WITH YOUR HARDCORE CONSERVATIVE Attitude and finally accept that: “Normal” is I! Everybody defines “normal” differently
column14: everybody defines it for himself or herself! Is it too much to ask to be left alone? Are we condemned today
column15: if we don’t want to know anything about anything
column16: but rather want to live OUR lives? Yes! Because then the fucking cops come and bag you up! Own opinion . . . hasn’t been allowed anymore for a long time. Miserable state! Miserable planet! Miserable life!

column1: 2006-08-13‎Shit! I feel as if I’m about to croak! My heart hurts so terribly
column2: that I am bent over because of the pain.

column2: imagine the trench coat covers all your tools for justice
column3: and then you throw the first Molotov cocktail
column4: the first bomb. You are sending your most hated place to hell!

column1: 2006-09-18‎We don’t live in a democracy! We are well on our way to a dictatorship! Except for the brown fools in Dresden
column2: we are surrounded by fascist pigs every day! If you compare today’s apparatus of state with Hitler’s
column3: then you will notice very quickly
column4: that what they want to sell as politics here is old soup in new cans. Let’s only look at the Nazis’ concentration camps . . . that’s the same shit as prisons. Who ended up in the camps? The so-called political enemies. And who ends up in prisons today? The so-called political enemies! You are already their enemy when you park in the wrong parking lot
column5: then they force you to pay money. Shit! I am allowed to park where ever I want! Democracy = government of the people. Shit
column6: can you tell me where people rule? Every 4 years maybe
column7: when we have the choice between shit
column9: and real shit? This fascist country needs riots and street fights
column10: until this miserable government is overthrown! And essentially what did the SS
column11: the SA do back then? They locked up people when they were against the government. And the cops today? They do the same! And then there would still be our beloved school . . . to be compared to the Hitler Youth. You undergo brain washing without noticing it. You are pounded with what is good and what is bad . . . in their eyes. Whoever fights back
column12: ends up in the concentration camp . . . pardon

column1: 2006-09-26‎ERIC HARRIS Probably the most reasonable boy that a shitty high school can offer . . . pff . . . ERIC HARRIS IS GOD! There is no doubt. It is scary how similar Eric was to me. Sometimes it seems as if I were to live his life again
column2: as if everything would repeat itself. I am not a copy of REB
column7: Weise or anybody else! I am the advancement of REB! I learned from his mistakes
column8: the bombs. I learned from his entire life. column1: 2006-10-18‎It doesn’t matter what you do in your life
column2: everything is fading! RX! Even my attack on GSS is undone someday! I wish I could turn back this frigging time
column3: and start from the beginning with the knowledge I have now. But even if I could
column4: it wouldn’t change anything about the state and the government. I hate this damn country! I want to be free! “Death or freedom” The state of affairs: Today 1 kg of sulfur was bought
column5: to produce gun powder In the following days
column7: and a .45 pistol will be bought. Timed bombs are being built next week! Planned arsenal: .22
column11: 2 or 3 of them are timed bombs
column18: Toufac CO2 pump gun and enough ammunition for the weapons! Perhaps still ammonium nitrate
column19: I could get tons of this fucking stuff for free
column20: but I don’t have the opportunity to experiment with it. Before any one of you claims that I am Harris’ or anybody else’s copycat
column21: you should think about it for a moment: Is a priest in a small village only the pope’s “copycat”? No! Of course not! He believes in the same thing as the pope
column22: but he doesn’t copy him. He looks at things the same. Like the fucking pope
column23: he is part of a whole. Don’t you dare have any of these spiritual dick-faces open their mouths at my funeral! THERE IS NO FUCKING GOD But how was the world created . . . I always thought that at one time or another
column29: one thing resulted from another. But I have absolutely no idea where the hell these 2 substances were supposed to have come from!

column2: the school will be burning and my brain will be blown out! I just went to GSS to see if everybody will be there when this shit starts. And YES! They will! I’m not fucking psycho! It’s not Airsoft or music that make me killing people
column3: it’s you! Airsoft helped my to hit what I’m aiming! Music helped me when I was fuckin’ down! All I want now is killing
column4: hurting and scaring as much people as possible! Sometimes I write shit in english
column5: because I want everybody to understand what the hell I’m talking about!

column1: 2006-11-19‎This is the last evening I will ever see. I should be happy about all this
column2: but somehow I’m not. It’s my family . . . They are all good people
column3: and I will hurt them tomorrow. It’s sad
column4: to know I won’t see them again after tomorrow morning. To those I love: I’m very sorry about all this. I never had a girlfriend
column5: I never kissed a girl . . . but wait
column6: there was this wannabe Gothic chick . . . don’t like these . . . but I was drunk
column7: so fuck that. I’m not gay! I don’t think its a problem if anyone is lesbian or gay
column8: but I’m not. I like Jill
column9: from Resident Evil Apocalypse and 3 Nemesis! That’s why I call my sawed off .22 “Jill”. The 12 Gauge is the “BFG” and the .45 is “Mister Pästerich
column10: ” named after Homer Simpsons Gun. I like the Simpsons. I don’t like Comics at all
column11: but I love the Simpsons and my own comics. Don’t believe shit people will tell after November 20th. For example that Henning Schumann dude . . . That guy is so stupid it’s not even funny. I thought I was a friend of him a long time ago
column12: but he’s a fucking liar. He hadn’t got real friends because he is just beating everybody . . . god what a fucking retarded ASSHOLE! If anybody of my whole big family is a good human
column15: my sister and my brother. I love them! And I hate me for hurting them. They are nice and good people! I hope that other outcasts will be treated better after GSS! And I hope that some of ’em will be like Reb
column16: Vod and Me: A FUCKING HERO! It’s kinda weird . . . I’ve been planning/knowing this for a long time
column17: and now it feels like DAAAMN That came quick!
